name: Basketball-AR
description:
Throw some balls in this fun and stunning augmented reality basketball game. We use the latest AR technology to give you the very best game experience.

You can choose between three different basket sizes to play on a table, in a room or outdoor.

You can change the design of the ball and the basket.

You can choose between different game modes and compare your skills with other players all over the world.

PLAY BASKETBALL wherever and whenever you want and be the next Basketball-AR-SUPERSTAR!
